description: Discover this inviting 884 sqft condo in Bensonhurst, complete with elevator access for added convenience. Inside, you?ll find a bright, open layout featuring a spacious living room, a modern kitchen, two well-proportioned bedrooms, and two bathrooms.    Enjoy the convenience of in-unit washer and dryer, central split heating and cooling, a balcony, and a private parking space. Extra storage is available on the first floor, and building-wide security cameras, accessible from your phone, offer enhanced peace of mind.    The location near Bay Parkway places you moments from local dining, grocery stores, and schools. Commuting is simple with nearby B6 and B4 bus lines, as well as the N train, providing easy access to the rest of the city. This is a wonderful opportunity to own a well-maintained home in a prime Brooklyn neighborhood.

This charming and inviting one-bedroom apartment offers the perfect retreat after a long day?s work, with a warm ambiance and thoughtful details that make it feel like home from the moment you step inside.     This apartment features a well-equipped kitchen with a refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, microwave, wine fridge, and ample cabinetry including soft-close drawers. This kitchen features a pull-out spice cabinet, window-side pantry cabinets, and both overhead and dimmable lighting for flexible illumination.    The living room has two large windows, one of which provides access to fire escape.  The bedroom has two closets, each with shelves at the top and bottom. There is ample space for a king-size bed, and two large windows that provide plenty of natural light. One of the windows is fitted to accommodate a window AC unit.  The radiator covers in both the living room and bedroom and provide safety while enhancing the rooms? appearance.  Located just off the kitchen, the dining area offers a charming view of both the kitchen and the foyer. The removable banquette and table add to its appeal and are included with the apartment.    It also offers excellent transportation within a short distance:  ? C train (local) on Fulton Street.  ? G train on Lafayette Ave.  ? Bus lines: B25/26 (Fulton Ave), B38 (Lafayette Ave), B69 (Vanderbilt Ave), and B54 (Myrtle Ave).    Smaller grocery stores can be found on Waverly and Fulton Ave, with Stop & Shop and Target at Atlantic Terminal also within a short distance.  Across from Atlantic Terminal, is the Barclays Center which offers concerts, basketball games, and various entertainment events.   This area is lively, with many restaurants and both McDonald's and Chick-fil-A located two blocks away on Atlantic Ave.

Seller Open to Offers - Don't Miss Out! Priced to Sell!    Welcome to a spacious and inviting 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath Condo with low maintenance fees  256 that includes water located in a well maintained building in the heart of Brooklyn sought-after Gerritsen Beach area.  This bright airy home features an open concept living and dining area filled with natural light, perfect for both relaxing and entertaining.  The kitchen boast ample cabinetry and full-size  appliances.  Three generously sized bedrooms provide comfort to fit your lifestyle whether family, quest, or a home office.  Enjoy the convenience of in-unit laundry and unwind on you private balcony of the primary bedroom. Assigned parking and professional building management add to the ease of living.  Located in the basement is a storage room dedicated to you.  This home is situated across the street from Marine park, schools, shopping (supermarket around the corner), dinning, and public transportation.  Owner is open to all offers.

Welcome to this elegant 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom home in a newly constructed luxury development located right on the waterfront in Sheepshead Bay. Designed for comfort and style, this single-level residence features high-end finishes, modern conveniences, and access to exceptional amenities.

The open-concept living and dining space is filled with natural light and complemented by sleek finishes throughout. The chef?s kitchen is outfitted with premium stainless-steel appliances, custom cabinetry, and stone countertops ? perfect for both daily living and entertaining. Enjoy access to expansive communal outdoor spaces right on the water ? ideal for relaxing or socializing in a serene marina setting. Building amenities include a swimming pool, state-of-the-art fitness center, and landscaped common areas. Resident parking is also available for added convenience.

Situated in the heart of Sheepshead Bay, you're just moments from waterfront dining, local cafes, and vibrant neighborhood life.

Thoughtfully designed across two levels, this home combines contemporary style, high-end finishes, and functional living space in a vibrant waterfront setting.

The main level features an open-concept living and dining area with sleek finishes, floor-to-ceiling windows, and a designer kitchen equipped with premium stainless-steel appliances, stone countertops, and custom cabinetry. A convenient half bath adds to the comfort and practicality of the entertaining space.

Downstairs, you'll find a generously sized bedroom with ample closet space and a full en-suite bathroom featuring spa-quality fixtures and finishes. An in-unit washer and dryer provide added convenience.

Residents enjoy access to top-tier amenities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, landscaped communal outdoor areas, and resident parking. Located right on the water and just moments from the shops, restaurants, and scenic beauty of Sheepshead Bay, this duplex offers the perfect blend of luxury and lifestyle.

description:

Welcome to Ocean 24, a thoughtfully designed new development offering 24 residences along the scenic, tree-lined boulevard of Ocean Parkway. Mohalk flooring throughout, soundproof Pella windows, and are equipped with a full-size GE washer/dryer for ultimate convenience. The meticulously-crafted sensibility extends to the kitchen, featuring refined, modern cabinetry?complemented with a Calacatta quartz stone countertop. Complete with a premium Fisher & Paykel appliance suite and Kraus stainless-steel sink, the jewelry of the kitchen is illuminated by sleek, undercabinet lighting for the ultimate cooking experience. 

Discover a blend of opulence and practicality in the bathroom designs, with a Fresca double-sink vanity with gracious under-sink storage?punctuated by sleek Grohe fixtures. Wrapped in Calacatta quartz stone and smooth stone underfoot, relax in a serene and spa-like bathroom appointed with a deep soaking Duravit bathtub. 

Indulge in self-care with the state-of-the-art fitness center or retreat to the common rooftop for relaxation and casual gatherings, with sweeping views of the Manhattan skyline. Private parking and storage units are also available for purchase.

Commuting is effortless with the F/G/B/Q trains all close at hand. At 379 Ocean Parkway, discover a lifestyle where classic charm meets contemporary convenience. 

Ocean 24 redefines boutique condominium living?where luxury meets livability.

Welcome to residence 10C at The Argyle?a bright, modern, and thoughtfully designed one-bedroom home with a private balcony and sweeping eastern views reaching all the way to Prospect Park. Perched on the 10th floor, this sun-flooded apartment boasts soaring 9-foot ceilings, hardwood floors, and oversized, noise-reducing windows that span the length of the home, offering peaceful ambiance and energizing morning light.

The open kitchen features bamboo cabinetry, Caesarstone countertops, beautiful pendant lighting, and premium stainless-steel appliances?including a Bosch dishwasher. The spacious bedroom easily accommodates a king-sized bed and includes a custom walk-in closet, while the bathroom offers a deep soaking tub and ample storage throughout.

Additional highlights include built-in surround sound wiring in both the living room and bedroom, generous closet space, and a private, climate-controlled storage unit in the basement.

The Argyle is a full-service, pet-friendly condominium offering residents a virtual doorman, elegant lobby, fitness center, bike storage, laundry room, cold storage for grocery deliveries, and a large package room. The building also features a beautifully furnished roof deck with panoramic 360-degree views of Manhattan, Brooklyn, and the Statue of Liberty?perfect for sunset lounging.

The condo also comes with a private rooftop terrace?perfect for relaxing or entertaining?as well as a separate storage room for added convenience. This condo will be sold together with a private, secured parking space for an additional $50,000, offering extra value and peace of mind in a high-demand area. Don?t miss this rare opportunity to own a stylish, sun-filled condo just minutes from the beach, shopping, and public transportation.

Welcome to Apartment 3D at The L Lofts, a rare and oversized one-bedroom home in the heart of Bushwick. This thoughtfully designed residence offers an expansive layout with modern finishes and generous storage throughout.

Step into an open-concept living and kitchen area, ideal for entertaining or relaxing at home. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a wine fridge, dishwasher, and ample cabinet space. The bedroom is a true retreat, complete with a spacious closet and a second closet conveniently located just off the bathroom.

What sets this home apart are its two private outdoor spaces: enjoy your morning coffee on the large balcony or take in panoramic views from your private roof deck, located just steps from your door on the same level.

Additional highlights include:
Two spacious closets
Deeded storage unit in the basement
Central heating and cooling
Low monthly taxes and common charges
$129.89 monthly assessment for roof replacement (through 2026)

The L Lofts is an intimate 15-unit boutique condominium offering a perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and style. Residents enjoy access to a well-equipped fitness center, complimentary laundry facilities, a modern video intercom system, and the added bonus of a tax abatement through 2032.

Located less than 25 feet from the L train ? NYC?s most reliable subway line ;) ? your daily commute is as easy as it gets. You?re also just steps from Maria Hernandez Park, a local favorite featuring a dog run, volleyball and basketball courts, handball, and an outdoor gym.

Contact us today to schedule a private viewing.

This building is approved for a 1st-time homebuyers? program. First time buyers may qualify for a loan with a 5.75% fixed interest rate for 30 years. Please note that the interest rate is subject to change. Don?t miss out on this opportunity!

Located in the heart of Prospect Park South, 608 Ocean Avenue is a boutique nine-story condominium offering 32 thoughtfully designed residences. This 421-a tax-abated elevator building combines modern convenience with the charm of a well-established neighborhood.

The collection features a range of layouts, including studio, one-bedroom, one-bedroom with a home office, and two-bedroom residences. Select homes offer private outdoor spaces, while all boast expansive windows that fill the interiors with natural light.

Residence 201 is a spacious one-bedroom home with a flexible home office/additional room alcove.
The layout seamlessly connects the living space with the alcove, offering adaptability to suit diverse preferences.

Each home at 608 Ocean Avenue is equipped with premium stainless steel General Electric appliances, including a five-burner electric stove, microwave, and full-size dishwasher. Kitchens are elegantly finished with cream quartz countertops, under-cabinet lighting, and custom cabinetry, creating a stylish and efficient space.

Bathrooms feature oversized porcelain tiles, deep soaking tubs, and LED anti-fog mirrors, offering a clean and modern aesthetic. The home also features engineered hardwood floors, a dual split system for heating and cooling, and an in-unit GE washer-dryer combo.

Building amenities include a furnished rooftop terrace, bike storage, and optional parking for purchase.

Perfectly positioned in close proximity to Prospect Park, 608 Ocean Avenue places you at the center of a vibrant community. Enjoy convenient access to local markets, dining, and essential services, all while being just moments from Brooklyn?s beloved park.

All measurements are approximate. Images are renders that were virtually staged. Pictures Represent Various Layouts.

The complete offering terms are in an offering plan available from the File No: CD240098

This semi-detached two-family home is in Seagate, Brooklyn?s only private, gated beachfront community. Built in 1940, this property offers a rare opportunity to enjoy security, space, and exclusive neighborhood amenities, including 24/7 guard-gated access, private beach rights, and discounted membership to the Sea Gate Pool Club with cabanas. HOA fee is $3,759/annually

The home features four bedrooms and two bathrooms across two levels. The first-floor apartment includes two spacious bedrooms, a full bath, and generous storage. The primary bedroom accommodates a king-size bed and features a deep closet, while the second bedroom opens onto a backyard deck and patio?perfect for indoor-outdoor living. An open living and dining area flows into a galley kitchen, creating a comfortable and practical layout. The second-floor unit offers two additional bedrooms, a full bathroom, a sun-filled living room, and a dedicated dining area. Abundant natural light fills every room, enhancing the warm and inviting atmosphere. Each unit provides privacy and functionality, making this home ideal for multi-generational living or rental income. Recent updates include a brand-new boiler. Additional highlights include a private driveway, garage, and a spacious backyard.

Enjoy coastal living just moments from the beach while staying connected to the best of Brooklyn, with access to public transportation, parks, and local shopping. Seagate offers a peaceful, tight-knit community and a lifestyle that?s truly unmatched in the borough.

The brand-new luxury condo building at Borough Park. The building has one elevator, continuous 24-hour surveillance, a visual doorbell intercom system, keyless entry using smart keys, and indoor parking spaces are available for rent. Few minutes away from the N, R, D train and Bus B70. A short distance away into 8th Ave and it is convenient for all. CC include cold water and garage removal. Must see!

Located at One Hanson Place, formerly the Williamsburg Savings Bank Tower, one of Brooklyn's most iconic and distinguished buildings, this spacious loft-like studio unit boasts open layout which provides plenty of space for dining, living, working and sleeping. The full-size kitchen features modern white lacquer cabinetry and stainless steel appliances, including a professional grade Viking cooktop and oven, a SubZero fridge and a Bosch dishwasher. 

Oversized east-facing windows bring in wonderful light and look over Fort Greene and beyond. A sizable closet, cleverly hidden behind a large sliding mirror, provides great storage. The marble bath has a deep soaking tub and a large linen closet. Ten foot ceilings and rich chestnut flooring can be found throughout. 

The wonderful building amenities include a full?time doorman, a live-in super, concierge service, a playroom, a game room, a fitness center, central laundry room, four common terraces, all with breathtaking views, a lounge with kitchenette, a conference room, and bike storage. 

Conveniently located with 10 subway lines, the LIRR and Barclays Center, Target, the Apple Store, and Whole Foods literally out the front door. In the heart of the BAM Cultural district, One Hanson Place offers easy access to everything, including Fort Greene Park, Fort Greene farmers market, unlimited dining options in Fort Greene, Boerum Hill, Park Slope and Downtown Brooklyn.

description:
Step into a realm of sophistication and comfort with this stunning 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom gem, featuring an exclusive 350 sqft terrace adorned with premium Ipe decking plus in-unit washer/dryer. Nestled within a charming converted pre-war mansion on the enchanting Saint Marks Avenue, this home effortlessly blends historic charm with modern luxury.?

Experience the pinnacle of elegance with natural white oak herringbone hardwood floors and bespoke white and blue shaker-style cabinetry, accented by oil-rubbed bronze hardware. The kitchen is a culinary masterpiece, showcasing white Caesarstone countertops and a top-tier stainless steel appliance suite, including a Bertazzoni range with Faber hood, Fisher-Paykel counter-depth refrigerator, and Electrolux dishwasher.?Indulge in the spa-like bathroom, designed with wall-to-wall beveled white subway tiles, brushed nickel hardware, and a deep soaking tub. The custom-built marble-top vanity is complemented by hand-painted designer-patterned floors, creating a unique sanctuary.?

Crown Heights offers an array of vibrant shopping, dining, and recreational venues like Chavela's, Mayfield, and Cent'Anni. The Brooklyn Children's Museum is conveniently located across the street. Enjoy effortless travel with the A & C trains at Kingston-Throop Avenues, the 3 train at Kingston Avenue, and the 4 train via Eastern Parkway. Nearby, explore the lush serenity of Brower and St. John's Parks, with the iconic Prospect Park just a short journey away. Welcome to your new home?a blend of timeless elegance and modern convenience.

LAST SPONSOR UNIT

Introducing a stunning collection of luxury condominiums in Sheepshead Bay, featuring elegantly designed construction. This amenity-rich building showcases a perfect blend of an architecturally striking fa‡ade and modern, custom interior finishes.

BUILDING AMENITIES: The building offers a welcoming lobby and reception area, a rooftop lounge, secure garage parking, and a 24-hour virtual door attendant. It incorporates smart building technology, R26 insulation, soundproof windows, and open-concept living spaces. Each unit boasts contemporary kitchens and bathrooms, along with central A/C and radiant heated floors.

Situated in a prime location, you?ll enjoy easy access to beautiful waterfront areas along Sheepshead Bay and Manhattan Beach. The vibrant local scene includes excellent shopping, dining, and nightlife. With B and Q trains, reliable bus services, and nearby parkways, the entire city is within easy reach. Garage Parking Available.
2 Family 2 Bedroom over 1 Bedroom Apartment. Short Sale final approval through third party.

Absolutely stunning J4 ( can be easily made a second bedroom ) with large balcony and amazing open ocean view , just steps to the boardwalk and ocean beach ! Apartment is totally renovated with large walk in and 4 more closets ! All Utilities and Pool included into maintenance! You pay only your phone bill ! Luxury coop has modern large laundry, pool , gym , pm security. absolutely beautiful Party Hall , tennis room , storage and bike storage, PM security, parcel service live in super .. Live in Resort all year around !

Location, Location, location!   Welcome to this beautiful Luxurious boutique condo building with a deeded attached one car parking garage plus Storage space.   This unit features beautiful hardwood floors, a very spacious chefs eat-in kitchen with double sinks, double ovens and   ample closet space. There are three spacious bedrooms and three bathrooms, the primary bedroom comes with an on- suit, 2nd bedroom has a sizeable balcony. The building features an elevator with a phone that takes you directly to your own private floor. As you enter the unit of 1,308 sq ft., you will be met with abundance of sunlight and a spacious living room/dining room area which will lead you to a nice balcony.  Rear bedrooms have new double pane windows for soundproofing.  Building includes features such as keyless entry, and a secured lobby.     Maintenance Fee Includes: Elevator and elevator phone, Building insurance, Water/Sewer, Garbage removal, Electric and cleaning of common space.    This condo unit is conveniently located near houses of worship, great private schools, endless restaurants, shopping and transportation.   The Q train is conveniently located on avenue J and minutes away from the unit. (this unit is currently used as an investment; Taxes can be reduced for users).

Bank-Owned Auction Opportunity.
Be ready to bid on Auction.com! The online auction starts on 08-12-2025. SAVE THIS PROPERTY TODAY on Auction.com to get important updates and auction details.
Why Auction.com?
We connect buyers with real estate deals nationwide. Search, bid, and win properties on our user-friendly auction platform.

Welcome to this beautifully maintained two-level condominium in the heart of Canarsie! This spacious 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom unit on the first floor and lower level, offers an inviting layout. With two separate living areas, you?ll have plenty of space to relax and entertain. The first floor boasts an open, airy feel with a nice sized living/dining room combo and modern kitchen. You?ll find two nice- sized bedrooms, including a master suite with an en-suite bathroom and a conveniently place 2nd full bathroom. On the lower level is another bedroom, a 1/2 bathroom and the 2nd living area perfect for entertaining. Come outside and enjoy your own large private backyard ? perfect for outdoor gatherings, gardening, or simply unwinding in your own peaceful retreat. One parking space is included but this condo is just a short distance to public transportation, making commuting a breeze. This condominium also offers many conveniences such as an in-unit washer, dryer and dishwasher. Don?t miss the opportunity to make this exceptional property your own! Property taxes are without STAR exemption.

LOW MAINTENANCE !NO PROPERTY TAX! Seacoast Towers - luxury co-op building located at the shore of the Atlantic Ocean. Amazing oversized 1000 Sq. Ft. UNBELIEVABLE OCEAN VIEW Junior 4/2 bedrooms apartment. This beauty has all the amenities you would want in a home. Generous size kitchen with dining area, multiple closets and a private balcony overlooking the majestic Oceana Complex and Ocean. Seacoast Terrace also offers a private state of the art gym, sauna, 24-hour doormen, laundry area, bicycle room, and storage facilities. The towers are located steps away from where you can take early morning strolls along the Shore and enjoy the best of Brighton Beach?s fabulous restaurants and charming boutiques. The area also features excellent public & private schools and one of the best City beaches and boardwalk.

Experience a beautiful blend of style, comfort, and functionality in this luminous one bedroom residence. From its impressive ceiling height and sleek finishes to its well?designed layout and abundant storage, this home delivers a serene urban living experience.

Step into a welcoming entryway that leads to a spacious living area bathed in natural light. Oversized north?facing windows and white oak flooring create an airy, open atmosphere throughout. The chef?inspired kitchen is a highlight, featuring premium Bosch appliances, crisp quartz countertops with a breakfast bar, and plenty of cabinet space for seamless everyday living. Off the living room is a Juliet balcony.

The tranquil bedroom is a perfect retreat, easily accommodating a full suite of furnishings, while the spa?inspired bathroom offers floor?to?ceiling tilework and sleek matte black fixtures for a sophisticated, calming feel. The residence also includes three roomy closets and an exclusive private storage cage, making it ideal for those seeking both style and practicality.

Completed in 2020, 111 Montgomery offers an array of premium amenities for its residents, including a 24?hour doorman, live?in super, fitness center, co?working space, children?s playroom, courtyard lounge, expansive roof deck with BBQ grills, bike storage, and an on?site garage (waitlist applies).

Perfectly positioned in Crown Heights, this building is just moments from Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Botanic Garden, surrounded by acclaimed restaurants, caf‚s, and cocktail bars. The 2, 3, 4, and 5 express trains nearby provide quick access to Manhattan, making this the ideal spot to enjoy the best of both worlds ? a quiet, welcoming space to call home with the vibrancy of the city right at your doorstep.

With its timeless finishes, premium amenities, and ideal location, this residence is an exceptional opportunity. Contact us today to arrange a private showing.

Space, style & modern luxury come together at 486 Ashford Street!
A meticulously renovated brick 1 family with private parking! Yes you read right, PRIVATE PARKING IN EAST NEW YORK!
486 Ashford street will captivate you from the moment you arrive with its warm & welcoming energy! 

Open the door and enter an expansive sun drenched, modern open concept living/dining area which provides great space for entertaining. The elegant chefs granite kitchen is tucked away towards the rear of the property and features floor to ceiling custom cabinetry, adorned with a full fleet of stainless steel appliances, and leads out into lush rear yard. 1/2 bath on the first floor for your guest. 

Up a flight of stairs 3 spacious bedrooms awaits you, each equipped with ample closet space. Down the a hall a state of the art modern fully tiled bathroom awaits you that is adorned with spa-like finishes. 

The high ceiling full finished basement can easily be used as the perfect media den, guest quarters, storage space or additional recreational space.

486 Ashford Street has been fully gutted and remodeled by an expert team of contractors and designers featuring select wide oak wood flooring, recessed lighting, updated electrical, heating & plumbing systems throughout. 

This masterfully re-imagined brick 1 family is conveniently located with close proximity to major transportation which makes commuting a breeze. Just off Sutter Avenue, Blake Avenue, Pitkin Avenue,Liberty Avenue. Short blocks to schools, shopping centers, restaurants, cafes, parks, and many other vibrant neighborhood amenities.

All showings are by appointment. 

Welcome to 55 Hicks Street, nestled in the heart of historic Brooklyn Heights. This beautifully renovated one-bedroom apartment offers a unique blend of charm and modern comfort in a well-established co-op building. With its semi-private entrance, the residence exudes a townhouse-like feel, providing a warm and inviting atmosphere.

Step into an expansive living room filled with natural light streaming through windows in every room. The apartment boasts 10-foot high ceilings, creating an airy, spacious ambiance complemented by elegant built-in bookcases and abundant storage, including a generous walk-in closet. Thoughtfully designed with wall-mounted split air conditioning units, the space ensures year-round comfort.

The large, fully renovated kitchen is a chef?s delight, featuring ample cabinet and counter space that make both everyday meals and entertaining a pleasure. Sunny and cozy, this home is truly a serene urban retreat.

Perfectly positioned just steps from the waterfront, you?ll find yourself moments away from the iconic Brooklyn Bridge Park, offering breathtaking views, scenic greenways, and vibrant outdoor activities. The neighborhood's charming, tree-lined streets are steeped in history, showcasing magnificent architecture that captivates at every turn.

Brooklyn Heights is celebrated as New York?s first landmarked community, known for its enchanting atmosphere and a delightful array of local dining spots, including Inga?s Bar, Jules, Poppy?s, Noodle Pudding, Bevacco, Binc, Joe Coffee, Alice?s Tea Cup, and many more. Just one block away lies the world-renowned Brooklyn Promenade, where you can soak in stunning views of Lower Manhattan and the Statue of Liberty, watch breathtaking sunsets, or simply take a leisurely stroll.

55 Hicks Street itself is a meticulously maintained pre-war co-op with all the conveniences you need, including a laundry room, bike room, and additional storage. The building is professionally managed, ensuring a seamless and comfortable living experience.

With eight subway lines nearby, commuting is effortless, placing you just minutes from Manhattan or downtown Brooklyn. Plus, the building welcomes pets, and there?s even a veterinary clinic on the same block, making it the perfect place for both you and your furry companions.

This is more than just a home?it?s a lifestyle, surrounded by culture, history, and vibrant city life. Welcome to 55 Hicks Street, where timeless elegance meets modern convenience. Your new home awaits.

Prime Midwood location! This spacious 2-bedroom, top-floor unit offers over 700 sqft of living space. Features include hardwood and tile flooring, a combined living/dining area with access to a private terrace, a galley kitchen with stainless steel appliances, generously sized bedrooms with ample closet storage, and 3 A/C units. The unit also includes a deeded parking space in the underground garage. The building provides elevator access, virtual doorman, secure lobby, and is pet-friendly. Ideally located near schools, parks, and various local amenities, with convenient access to multiple bus routes.

Welcome home to this serene, east-facing one-bedroom condo at Boulevard East, located at 53 Boerum Place in vibrant Boerum Hill, Brooklyn. The apartment features hardwood floors throughout and an inviting open kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave and a practical breakfast bar perfect for casual dining and entertaining.

Glass-paneled French doors elegantly separate the spacious living area from the comfortable bedroom, which easily accommodates a queen-size bed and offers ample closet space. The modern bathroom is thoughtfully designed with sleek finishes, generous storage, and a large mirrored vanity.

Boulevard East is a full-service condominium offering a 24-hour doorman, fitness center, resident lounge, on-site laundry, and a beautifully landscaped courtyard. The building is pet-friendly.

Ideally situated at 53 Boerum Place, residents enjoy unparalleled access to Brooklyn?s finest dining, green spaces, and entertainment. Dine at top-rated restaurants such as French Louie or Rucola, or enjoy cocktails at the renowned Clover Club. Nearby Brooklyn Bridge Park and the Brooklyn Heights Promenade offer stunning views and recreation. Conveniently close to Barclays Center for sports and entertainment, Trader Joe?s, Whole Foods, Brooklyn Fare, and shopping at Barnes & Noble, Macy?s, and the Apple Store. Easy access to multiple subway lines (N/R/Q, 2/3, 4/5, F/G, A/C) makes commuting effortless.

Fantastic opportunity to live at The Aaron, a 17-Unit boutique elevator condominium on the border of South Slope & Greenwood! Parking spot available to buy for an additional cost! Inquire for pricing.  

6C is a high floor, East-facing 1-bedroom with wide plank hardwood floors, central heating & cooling, and a balcony for private outdoor space. The unit entrance has a foyer well-sized for hanging art with a coat closet for storage. On the left is the bedroom with oversized windows, a double door closet, and room for a king-sized bed plus furniture. Straight ahead is the large living room and open kitchen with an island built for bar seating. The impeccably designed modern kitchen contains Frosty Carrina Caesarstone countertops & slab backsplash, custom cabinets by StyleLite, Hansgrohe fixtures, and a suite of Bosch appliances including a built-in microwave. The stylish, Spa-like bathroom comes well-appointed with Artwork tile, radiant heated floors, DuraVit soaking tub, KEUCO medicine cabinet and vanity for additional storage. Adjacent to the bathroom is a laundry closet with stacked Whirlpool washer & dryer and a separate linen closet. The building has a convenient, easy-to-use Virtual Doorman system and every unit comes with a deeded storage cage in the basement.  

Built in 2017, The Aaron provides a suite of fabulous amenities including a spacious residents? lounge, bike storage, pet spa, gym, & landscaped roof deck with gas grill and stunning views of the Manhattan skyline, Hudson Bay, & the Statue of Liberty. The building is only one block from the Prospect Ave. R train stop and nearby all the shops, bars, and restaurants on 5th Ave. such as neighborhood favorite Luigi's Pizzeria, Siren Oyster Bar, South Slope Ramen, Le French Tart, Yardsale & Roots Cafe and just one mile away from Prospect Park, Nitehawk Cinema, Historic Green-Wood Cemetery and NYC's newest creative hub, Industry City.

***Please be aware there is currently an assessment of $95 per month in common charges being collected, which will end Nov. 30th 2025***

Welcome to your urban sanctuary pet friendly elevator condominium in the heart of Bath Beach/Gravesend. This comfortable 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom condo offers a perfect blend of modern design and convenience. Upon entering, you'll be greeted by an open concept living space flooded with natural light with plenty of closets and storage space throughout the unit. Newly renovated kitchen features sleek stainless-steel appliances and ample cabinet space for storage. Beautiful hardwood floors throughout. Washer/Dryer in unit. Come outside to your own private L shape 200 sq ft terrace, where you can enjoy a relaxing view of the Verrazano Bridge and the waterfront. Retreat to the master suite, a serene haven designed for ultimate comfort and relaxation. Complete with a generous walk-in closet and a full bathtub bathroom. The second bedroom is equally inviting, offering versatility as a home office, or personal sanctuary. Low monthly maintenance fee of only $266 includes water and a parking space. In addition, tax abatement comes as a major bonus with the annual tax of only $108! This condo is sitting in close proximity with all sorts of public transportations (D train and express bus to the city). Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience luxurious urban living at its finest. Schedule your private tour today and make this exquisite condo your new home!

This is a 3rd floor - no elevator condo, 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom, with living room and dining room combination. Modern style and well maintained throughout. The unit features hardwood floors in the Living / Dining room, Tile in the Kitchen and Bathroom and a rear facing terrace. Owners enjoy the luxury of having their own Washer and Dryer Hookup for their Laundry needs. The Kitchen boasts stainless steel appliance like a new dishwasher and granite countertops - very clean. The heating system is a gas boiler of 10 years and works perfectly fine. This is a modern style building that was built in 1985. Also, worth mentioning that the unit is close to everything such as supermarkets, local fitness centers, schools and above all transportation. The R train is less than a minutes away and since it's the first stop on the line, you will be guaranteed a seat for your daily commute. There is also local bus services nearby that run to Staten Island as well as an Express bus that runs to Manhattan should you so choose.

Welcome to 184 Clinton Ave, a truly remarkable piece of New York City history. This stunning Queen Anne mansion, built in 1892, was recently highlighted in Brownstoner?s "The Amazing Mansions of Brooklyn?s Clinton Avenue." Now, you have a rare opportunity to own a piece of NYC real estate in one of Brooklyn's most sought-after neighborhoods.ÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿÿ

This charming garden-level one-bedroom apartment presents the perfect opportunity to transition from renting to owning in the heart of Clinton Hill. With its own beautiful private entrance, it offers the feeling of a townhouse. The tranquil patio is perfect for sipping your morning coffee or unwinding on summer evenings, all while enjoying peaceful views of the expansive backyard.

The apartment boasts beautiful hardwood floors, Caesarstone countertops, stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher, a washer/dryer, and a luxurious bathroom. The spacious layout features an grand entry foyer, which leads into inviting living area, a windowed home office, a generously sized eat-in kitchen with ample storage and counter space, and a king-sized bedroom.

This historic co-op is ideally located just steps away from the vibrant shops and restaurants of Myrtle Avenue, and a short stroll from Fort Greene Park, home to a popular Farmers Market. The nearby Clinton-Washington G line subway and B54 bus offer convenient access to downtown Brooklyn.

Don?t miss this exceptional opportunity to own a piece of NYC history in one of Clinton Hill?s most sought-after locations.

This charming alcove studio in Brooklyn Heights offers a unique blend of comfort and breathtaking views. Designed to maximize space, the studio features a cleverly designed sleeping alcove that provides a sense of separation from the living area, enhancing privacy and functionality. The interior boasts hardwood floors and a separate dressing area, creating an open and airy atmosphere. Large windows frame stunning vistas of the Brooklyn Bridge and the Manhattan skyline, ensuring that the city's iconic landmarks are always within sight. Enjoy your own private balcony, providing outdoor space to relax and entertain while taking in panoramic views of New York City. Located in the historic Brooklyn Heights neighborhood, the studio is just one subway stop away from Manhattan, offering easy access to the city's vibrant cultural and business hubs. The area is renowned for its elegant brownstones, tree-lined streets, and the picturesque Brooklyn Heights Promenade, making it a sought-after location for those seeking both tranquility and proximity to urban amenities with views
Excellent Investment Opportunity in Brooklyn on Jackie Robinson Pkwy. Conveniently located.

Boutique 8-Unit Condominium in Sunset Park, Brooklyn

Experience the perfect blend of modern luxury and urban convenience in this boutique 8-unit condominium, nestled in the vibrant Sunset Park neighborhood of Brooklyn. Each residence is thoughtfully designed with high-end stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher and in-unit washer/dryer, providing a comfortable and stylish living experience. Every unit features an extra-large balcony for outdoor enjoyment, while first-floor units offer private terraces, adding an extra layer of exclusivity.

Beyond the beautifully appointed living spaces, residents will appreciate the building?s amenities, which include a secure storage room and exclusive roof-top rights with breathtaking city skyline views.

This condominium?s location is truly unbeatable. With the R train at 53rd Street just steps away, commuting is a breeze. You?re also within close proximity to Industry City and Costco, offering premier shopping and entertainment options. For food lovers, Bay Ridge is nearby, known for its exceptional dining scene, and 8th Avenue, famous for its amazing Fusion Cuisine, is just a short distance away.

Embrace the essence of boutique living in Sunset Park, where modern elegance meets unmatched urban accessibility and culinary delights are at your doorstep.

Welcome to Unit 4B at 1546 Broadway, a thoughtfully designed 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom home spanning 612 SF in a boutique new development at the intersection of Bedford-Stuyvesant and Bushwick. One of just 10 exclusive residences, this residence offers modern comfort and seamless urban connectivity.

Expansive double-paned windows that open into 73 SF of private outdoor space fills each room with natural light. The open, thoughtfully designed layout maximizes space and functionality, creating a seamless flow for both relaxing and entertaining.

The kitchen is a perfect balance of modern design and practicality, featuring stainless steel appliances from LG, Bosch, and GE, quartz countertops, and a vented range for an elevated cooking experience.

The bathroom features high-quality finishes, a soaking tub, and a smart mirror, creating a refined and relaxing retreat. A Mitsubishi heating and cooling system ensures year-round comfort, while a GE in-unit washer and dryer add effortless convenience.

With its contemporary design, modern amenities, and prime location near the Halsey Street J subway station, 1546 Broadway offers seamless access to Manhattan while immersing residents in two of Brooklyn?s fastest-growing neighborhoods, rich with dining, arts, and culture.

The complete offering terms are in an offering plan available from Sponsor. File no. CD240007. All images are artists? renderings. They are provided for illustration purposes only. Not all items depicted in artist renderings are included in Unit purchase. Prospective purchasers should not rely upon these depictions and are advised to review the complete terms of the offering plan for further detail as to the type, quality, and quantity of materials, appliances, equipment, and fixtures to be included in the units, amenity areas and common areas of the condominium.

Spacious 2-Bedroom Co-op with Balcony & Partial Water Views in Prime Shore Road Location!
Welcome to a rare opportunity to own a spacious 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom co-op in one of Bay Ridge?s most sought-after locations.
